title: Attention
text: Grab the buyer's attention immediately with a personalized comment, a question about a recent trend, or a brief statement of the company's USP and values. Example: “I notice that you’ve been looking for a product. Can I help you find what you’re looking for?

title: Interest
text: Spark their interest by relating your product or service to their precise requirements and problems. Use open-ended questions to get as much information as you can. Example: “What kind of features are you looking for? What is your budget?

title: Desire
text: Instigate interest by showcasing the benefits and returns your product or service provides, focusing on concrete results that solve their problems. Whenever possible, use data points to add authenticity. “Our 5G connectivity will ensure that you’re connected to your loved ones at all times.

title: Action
text: Encourage the buyer to take the next action for continued engagement. This includes scheduling a demo, a follow-up conversation, or downloading resources. “Please go through our website to join the community where you will find many of your product-related questions answered.
